availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis L. Wheeler (Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha R. Pennington Wheeler in Trimble County, Kentucky, on July 14, 1845. Father of William F. Wheeler, Owen T. Wheeler, Silas P. Wheeler, Lydia E. Wheeler, John L. Wheeler, Kettie Wheeler, and Priscilla Wheeler. Farmer in Oldham County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 2, p. 26.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420389.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Westport Precinct, p. 12.
